name: WiseOwl
0:
”Alexa, ask Wise Owl am I right?”
”Alexa, ask Wise Owl are my parents wrong?”
”Alexa, ask Wise Owl is my buddy telling the truth?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wise owl
des:
Wise Owl declares you are right and everyone else wrong. Just ask Wise Owl, "Am I right?"

Perfect for pranks and practical jokes. Let Wise Owl make you a winner every time.

You can also ask Wise Owl if someone else is wrong and Wise Owl will tell you that they are. Fighting with your partner? Just say "Alexa, ask Wise Owl is my partner wrong?" and get the answer you want to hear!

Also works with wife/hubby, parents, grandparents, kids, pets, bosses, neighbors, buddies, doggies, kittens, etc...
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
